title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. F, pt. 298 - Procedure And Administration
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. F, pt. 298 - Procedure And Administration

State Regulations
§ 298.1 - Joint assessment of taxes and proportionate division of payment
§ 298.2 - Joint collection and enforcement activity by the department
§ 298.3 - Procedural and administrative regulations of the commissioner

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. F, pt. 298

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§171, subd. First, 697[a]; General City Law, art. 2-E, § 25-n[e]; Administrative Code of the City of New

York, § 11- 1943 [not subdivided]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
